revised_title: Breeding and Reproduction in Oysters and Freshwater Mussels
tldr: The author, Everard Home, examines the reproductive processes of oysters and freshwater mussels, providing detailed observations and insights into the anatomy and breeding habits of these bivalves. The study includes the role of the ovaria, oviduct, and the development of embryos, as well as the factors affecting the quality and taste of oysters during their breeding season.
